name: City Shoot Zom - Dead Killer
description:
City Shoot Zom - Dead Killer is the new free shooting real zombie war game of the year.Keep your finger on the kill shot virus trigger as you try to ensure your survival in a virus ravaged world. Upgrade your zombie killer skills as a survivor and zombie terminator in frontline fighting; enhance your zombie world war arsenal of weapons, such as sniper guns shotgun and rifles zombie assault.
FEATURES

- 3D shooting zombie environment
- Stunning HD zombie frontier shoot target graphics
- Captivating soundtrack and effects strike zombie
- Unique zombie craze Missions
- One of the most kill dead zombie objective epic weapons and arsenal
- Tons of different items to support your energy and stamina
- Tough Boss battles designed to push you to the limit
